Title: NETMESSAGE:A security card is needed to open the door
Translation: 打开这扇门需要一张安全卡

Title: NETMESSAGE:There is nothing on this corpse
Translation: 这具尸体上什么也没有

Title: NETMESSAGE:There must be a way to destroy this pipe and flood the area\n\nMaybe by using that truck ?
Translation: 一定有办法破坏这个管道，让水淹没这片区域\n\n或许可以试试用轨道车撞开？

Title: NETMESSAGE:Perhaps we could use the fallen wire to kill the mutant
Translation: 或许我们可以利用掉落的电缆来击杀变异怪物

Title: NETMESSAGE:Water is now flowing through this pipe.\n\nCould it be used for something ?
Translation: 这根管道中有水流过，或许可以拿来利用一下？

Title: NETMESSAGE:The truck is locked, there must be another way to make it move...
Translation: 轨道车被锁住了，一定有其他办法让它动起来...
